feed.title: Bow Valley (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bow Valley (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bow Valley 06:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 at times. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 90 at times this evening and after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
